name: Piratiska Riba
description:
It's not easy to be a lonley pirate...  Well atleast all the gold will be yours. Solve all fun puzzles to collet all the treasure.

Piratiska Riba is an atmospheric VR puzzle game. There are two Islands : Sad Palm Island and MugiPugi Island.  Each beautiful Island has various puzzles and tasks which you need to solve to collect treasure . This beautiful VR game offers you unlimited fun in a VR pirate world.

Piratiska Riba is currently just a prototype demo so we only have 2 levels and simple puzzles, but the pirate dream lives on so we plan to change that and add new levels and more complex in a later version.

The demo is made for our weekly game jam project for the Unity/C# education of the "PISMO" incubator in Novska, HR.
